short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing Video Speed Controller Plus for Chrome, Firefox, and other browsers. Speed up or slow down videos on OTT platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Video Speed Controller Plus is a simple yet effective extension for slowing down or speeding up videos on websites such as YouTube, Netflix, Hotstar and many others. It can also be used on social media platforms. The extension is compatible with Chrome, Firefox, and other popular browsers.

This extension tool is absolutely free. In addition, you can use the shortcut keys as well without having to open the extension (Make sure to pin it first). You can use the shortcut keys below:

• Speed Up: CTRL + Shift + Right Arrow.
• Slow Down: CTRL + Shift + Left Arrow.
• Reset: CTRL + Shift + Up Arrow.

Minimum Speed: 0.25x
Maximum Speed: 8.00x

How To Use Video Speed Controller Plus:

• Download the Video Speed Controller Plus extension.
• Pin it to the extension bar.
• Open any desired OTT platforms.
• Use the shortcut keys or the extension’s pop-up window to adjust the playback speed of the video.
